member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Animation
member.summary: We can set the same or different animation option to Tooltip while it is in open or close state. Refer the documentation [here](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/tooltip/animation.html?lang=typescript) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.CloseDelay
member.summary: It is used to close the Tooltip after a specified delay in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Content
member.summary: It is used to display the content of Tooltip which can be both string and HTML Elements. Refer the documentation [here](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/tooltip/content.html?lang=typescript) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.CssClass
member.summary: It is used to customize the Tooltip which accepts custom CSS class names that defines specific user-defined styles and themes to be applied on the Tooltip element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.EnableRtl
member.summary: It is used to display the Tooltip and content of Tooltip from right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Height
member.summary: It is used to set the height of Tooltip component which accepts both string and number values. When Tooltip content gets overflow due to height value then the scroll mode will be enabled. Refer the documentation [here](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/tooltip/setting-dimension.html?lang=typescript) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.IsSticky
member.summary: It is used to display the Tooltip in an open state until closed by manually. Refer the documentation [here](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/tooltip/open-mode.html?lang=typescript#sticky-mode) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.MouseTrail
member.summary: It allows the Tooltip to follow the mouse pointer movement over the specified target element. Refer the documentation [here](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/tooltip/position.html?lang=typescript#mouse-trailing) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.OffsetX
member.summary: It sets the space between the target and Tooltip element in X axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.OffsetY
member.summary: It sets the space between the target and Tooltip element in Y axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.OpenDelay
member.summary: It is used to open the Tooltip after the specified delay in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.OpensOn
member.summary: It is used to determine the device mode to display the Tooltip content. If it is in desktop, it will show the Tooltip content when hovering on the target element. If it is in touch device, it will show the Tooltip content when tap and holding on the target element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Position
member.summary: It is used to set the position of Tooltip element, with respect to Target element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.ShowTipPointer
member.summary: It is used to show or hide the tip pointer of Tooltip.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Target
member.summary: It is used to denote the target selector where the Tooltip need to be displayed. The target element is considered as parent container.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.TipPointerPosition
member.summary: It is used to set the position of tip pointer on tooltip. When it sets to auto, the tip pointer auto adjusts within the space of target's length and does not point outside. Refer the documentation [here](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/tooltip/position.html?lang=typescript#tip-pointer-positioning) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Width
member.summary: It is used to set the width of Tooltip component which accepts both string and number values. When set to auto, the Tooltip width gets auto adjusted to display its content within the viewable screen.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.AfterClose
member.summary: We can trigger `afterClose` event when the Tooltip Component gets closed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.AfterOpen
member.summary: We can trigger `afterOpen` event after the Tooltip Component gets opened.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.BeforeClose
member.summary: We can trigger `beforeClose` event before the Tooltip hides from the screen. If returned false, then the Tooltip is no more hidden.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.BeforeCollision
member.summary: We can trigger `beforeCollision` event for every collision fit calculation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.BeforeOpen
member.summary: We can trigger `beforeOpen` event before the Tooltip is displayed over the target element. When one of its arguments `cancel` is set to true, the Tooltip display can be prevented. This event is mainly used for the purpose of refreshing the Tooltip positions dynamically or to set customized styles in it and so on.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.BeforeRender
member.summary: We can trigger `beforeRender` event before the Tooltip and its contents are added to the DOM. When one of its arguments `cancel` is set to true, the Tooltip can be prevented from rendering on the page. This event is mainly used for the purpose of customizing the Tooltip before it shows up on the screen. For example, to load the AJAX content or to set new animation effects on the Tooltip, this event can be opted. Refer the documentation [here](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/tooltip/content.html?lang=typescript#dynamic-content-via-ajax) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Created
member.summary: We can trigger `created` event after the Tooltip component is created.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.Destroyed
member.summary: We can trigger `destroyed` event when the Tooltip component is destroyed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Popups.Tooltip.ContentTemplate
member.summary: To get or set value for ContentTemplate.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.Content
member.summary: Defines the content of the DropDownButton element that can either be a text or HTML elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.CssClass
member.summary: Defines class/multiple classes separated by a space in the DropDownButton element. The DropDownButton size and styles can be customized by using this.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies a value that indicates whether the DropDownButton is `disabled` or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.IconCss
member.summary: Defines class/multiple classes separated by a space for the DropDownButton that is used to include an icon. DropDownButton can also include font icon and sprite image.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.IconPosition
member.summary: Positions the icon before/top of the text content in the DropDownButton. The possible values are: Left: The icon will be positioned to the left of the text content. Top: The icon will be positioned to the top of the text content.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.Items
member.summary: Specifies action items with its properties which will be rendered as DropDownButton popup.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.Target
member.summary: Allows to specify the DropDownButton popup item element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.SplitButtons.DropDownButton.BeforeClose

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.ColumnQueryModeType
member.summary: `columnQueryMode`provides options to retrive data from the datasource. They are All Schema ExcludeHidden

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridLine
member.summary: Defines modes of GridLine, They are Both - Displays both the horizontal and vertical grid lines. None - No grid lines are displayed. Horizontal - Displays the horizontal grid lines only. Vertical - Displays the vertical grid lines only. Default - Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.PrintMode
member.summary: Print mode options are AllPages - Print all pages records of the Grid. CurrentPage - Print current page records of the Grid.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.TextAlign
member.summary: Defines alignments of text, they are Left Right Center Justify

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.AggregateType
member.summary: Defines the aggregate types.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.FilterBarMode
member.summary: Filter bar mode options are OnEnter - Initiate filter operation after Enter key is pressed. Immediate - Initiate filter operation after certain time interval. By default time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.FilterType
member.summary: Defines types of Filter Menu - Specifies the filter type as menu. Excel - Specifies the filter type as excel. FilterBar - Specifies the filter type as filter bar. CheckBox - Specifies the filter type as check box.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.EditMode
member.summary: Defines modes of editing. Ascending Descending

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.CellSelectionMode
member.summary: Defines mode of cell selection. Ascending Descending

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionMode
member.summary: Defines modes of Selection, They are Row Cell Both

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionType
member.summary: Defines types of Selection. They are Single - Allows user to select a row or cell. Multiple - Allows user to select multiple rows or cells.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.WrapMode
member.summary: Defines the wrap mode. Both - Wraps both header and content. Header - Wraps header alone. Content - Wraps content alone.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.ColumnName
member.summary: Defines the column name to display the aggregate value. If `columnName` is not defined, then `field` name value will be assigned to the `columnName` property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.CustomAggregate
member.summary: Defines a function to calculate custom aggregate value. The `type` value should be set to `custom`. To use custom aggregate value in the template, use the key as `${custom}`. Total aggregation: The custom function will be called with the whole data and the current `AggregateColumn` object. Group aggregation: This will be called with the current group details and the `AggregateColumn` object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.Field
member.summary: Defines the column name to perform aggregation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Defines the footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.Format
member.summary: Format is applied to a calculated value before it is displayed. Gets the format from the user, which can be standard or custom [`number`](../base/intl.html#number-formatter-and-parser) and [`date`](../base/intl.html#date-formatter-and-parser) formats.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.GroupCaptionTemplate
member.summary: Defines the group caption cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field name. key: The current grouped field value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.GroupFooterTemplate
member.summary: Defines the group footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field. key: The current grouped value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.Type
member.summary: Defines the aggregate type of a particular column. To use multiple aggregates for single column, specify the `type` as array. Types of aggregate are, sum average max min count truecount falsecount custom > Specify the `type` value as `custom` to use custom aggregation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregate.Columns
member.summary: Configures the aggregate columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.AllowEditing
member.summary: If `allowEditing` set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column. By default all columns are editable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If `allowFiltering` set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column. By default all columns are filterable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.AllowGrouping
member.summary: If `allowGrouping` set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column. By default all columns are groupable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.AllowReordering
member.summary: If `allowReordering` set to false, then it disables reorder of a particular column. By default all columns can be reorder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.AllowResizing
member.summary: If `allowResizing` set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.AllowSorting
member.summary: If `allowSorting` set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column. By default all columns are sortable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Columns
member.summary: Used to render multiple header rows(stacked headers) on the Grid header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Commands
member.summary: `commands` provides an option to display command buttons in every cell. The available built-in command buttons are Edit - Edit the record. Delete - Delete the record. Save - Save the record. Cancel - Cancel the edit state.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.CustomAttributes
member.summary: The CSS styles and attributes of the content cells of a particular column can be customized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.DataSource
member.summary: Defines the column data source which will act as foreign data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.DefaultValue
member.summary: Defines default values for the component when adding a new record to the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.DisableHtmlEncode
member.summary: If `disableHtmlEncode` is set to true, it encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.DisplayAsCheckBox
member.summary: If `displayAsCheckBox` is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Edit
member.summary: Defines the `IEditCell` object to customize default edit cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.EditType
member.summary: Defines the type of component for editing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.EnableGroupByFormat
member.summary: If `enableGroupByFormat` set to true, then it groups the particular column by formatted values. By default no columns are group by format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Field
member.summary: Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource. The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc., If the `field` name contains “dot”, then it is considered as complex binding. The `field` name must be a valid JavaScript identifier, the first character must be an alphabet and should not contain spaces and special characters.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Filter
member.summary: Defines the filter options to customize filtering for the particular column. @default null

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.FilterBarTemplate
member.summary: The `filterBarTemplate` is used to add a custom component instead of default input component for filter bar. It have create and read functions. create: It is used for creating custom components. read: It is used to perform custom filter action.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.ForeignKeyField
member.summary: Defines the mapping column name of the foreign data source. If it is not defined then the `columns.field` will be considered as mapping column name

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.ForeignKeyValue
member.summary: Defines the display column name from the foreign data source which will be obtained from comparing local and foreign data

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Format
member.summary: It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data. Gets the format from the user which can be standard or custom [`number`](../base/intl.html#number-formatter-and-parser) and [`date`](../base/intl.html#date-formatter-and-parser) formats.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Formatter
member.summary: Defines the method which is used to achieve custom formatting from an external function. This function triggers before rendering of each cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Defines the column template as string or HTML element ID which is used to add customized element in the column header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.HeaderText
member.summary: Defines the header text of column which is used to display in column header. If `headerText` is not defined, then field name value will be assigned to header text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.HeaderTextAlign
member.summary: Define the alignment of column header which is used to align the text of column header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.HideAtMedia
member.summary: column visibility can change based on its [`Media Queries`](http://cssmediaqueries.com/what-are-css-media-queries.html). `hideAtMedia` accepts only valid Media Queries.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.IsFrozen
member.summary: You can use this property to freeze selected columns in grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.IsIdentity
member.summary: If `isIdentity` is set to true, then this column is considered as identity column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.IsPrimaryKey
member.summary: If `isPrimaryKey` is set to true, considers this column as the primary key constraint.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.MaxWidth
member.summary: Defines the maximum width of the column in pixel or percentage, which will restrict resizing beyond this pixel or percentage.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.MinWidth
member.summary: Defines the minimum width of the column in pixels or percentage.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.ShowColumnMenu
member.summary: If `showColumnMenu` set to false, then it disable the column menu of a particular column. By default column menu will show for all columns

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.ShowInColumnChooser
member.summary: If `showInColumnChooser` set to false, then hides the particular column in column chooser. By default all columns are displayed in column Chooser.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.SortComparer
member.summary: It defines the custom sort comparer function.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Template
member.summary: Defines the column template that renders customized element in each cell of the column. It accepts either [template string](../base/template-engine.html) or HTML element ID.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.TextAlign
member.summary: Defines the alignment of the column in both header and content cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Type
member.summary: Defines the data type of the column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Uid
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier value of the column. It is used to get the object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.ValidationRules
member.summary: Defines rules to validate data before creating and updating.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.ValueAccessor
member.summary: Defines the method used to apply custom cell values from external function and display this on each cell rendered.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Visible
member.summary: If `visible` is set to false, hides the particular column. By default, all columns are displayed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn.Width
member.summary: Defines the width of the column in pixels or percentage.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowAdding
member.summary: If `allowAdding` is set to true, new records can be added to the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowDeleting
member.summary: If `allowDeleting` is set to true, existing record can be deleted from the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowEditOnDblClick
member.summary: If `allowEditOnDblClick` is set to false, Grid will not allow editing of a record on double click.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowEditing
member.summary: If `allowEditing` is set to true, values can be updated in the existing record.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings.Mode
member.summary: Defines the mode to edit. The available editing modes are: Normal Dialog Batch

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings.ShowConfirmDialog
member.summary: if `showConfirmDialog` is set to false, confirm dialog does not show when batch changes are saved or discarded.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings.ShowDeleteConfirmDialog
member.summary: If `showDeleteConfirmDialog` is set to true, confirm dialog will show delete action. You can also cancel delete command.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Columns
member.summary: Specifies the columns to be filtered at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the columns that were currently filtered.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings.ImmediateModeDelay
member.summary: Defines the time delay (in milliseconds) in filtering records when the `Immediate` mode of filter bar is set.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Mode
member.summary: Defines the filter bar modes. The available options are, `OnEnter`: Initiates filter operation after Enter key is pressed. `Immediate`: Initiates filter operation after a certain time interval. By default, time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Operators
member.summary: The `operators` is used to override the default operators in filter menu. This should be defined by type wise (string, number, date and boolean). Based on the column type, this customize operator list will render in filter menu.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings.ShowFilterBarStatus
member.summary: Shows or hides the filtered status message on the pager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Type
member.summary: Defines options for filtering type. The available options are `Menu` - Specifies the filter type as menu. `CheckBox` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox. `FilterBar` - Specifies the filter type as filterbar. `Excel` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.Aggregates
member.summary: Configures the Grid aggregate rows. > Check the [`Aggregates`](./aggregates.html) for its configuration.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowExcelExport
member.summary: If `allowExcelExport` set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Excel file.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If `allowFiltering` set to true the filter bar will be displayed. If set to false the filter bar will not be displayed. Filter bar allows the user to filter grid records with required criteria.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowGrouping
member.summary: If `allowGrouping` set to true, then it will allow the user to dynamically group or ungroup columns. Grouping can be done by drag and drop columns from column header to group drop area.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowMultiSorting
member.summary: If `allowMultiSorting` set to true, then it will allow the user to sort multiple column in the grid. > `allowSorting` should be true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowPaging
member.summary: If `allowPaging` is set to true, the pager renders at the footer of the Grid. It is used to handle page navigation in the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowPdfExport
member.summary: If `allowPdfExport` set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Pdf file.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowReordering
member.summary: If `allowReordering` is set to true, Grid columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index. > If Grid is rendered with stacked headers, reordering is allowed only at the same level as the column headers.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowResizing
member.summary: If `allowResizing` is set to true, Grid columns can be resized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowRowDragAndDrop
member.summary: If `allowRowDragAndDrop` is set to true, you can drag and drop grid rows at another grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowSelection
member.summary: If `allowSelection` is set to true, it allows selection of (highlight row) Grid records by clicking it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowSorting
member.summary: If `allowSorting` is set to true, it allows sorting of grid records when column header is clicked.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.AllowTextWrap
member.summary: If `allowTextWrap` set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.ChildGrid
member.summary: Defines Grid options to render child Grid. It requires the [`queryString`](./api-grid.html#querystring-string) for parent and child relationship.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.ColumnMenuItems
member.summary:
`columnMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom column menu items.
The available built-in items are, `AutoFitAll` - Auto fit the size of all columns. `AutoFit` - Auto fit the current column. `Group` - Group by current column. `Ungroup` - Ungroup by current column. `SortAscending` - Sort the current column in ascending order. `SortDescending` - Sort the current column in descending order. `Filter` - Filter options will show based on filterSettings property like checkbox filter, excel filter, menu filter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.ColumnQueryMode
member.summary: `columnQueryMode`provides options to retrive data from the datasource.Their types are `All`: It Retrives whole datasource. `Schema`: Retrives data for all the defined columns in grid from the datasource. `ExcludeHidden`: Retrives data only for visible columns of grid from the dataSource.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.Columns
member.summary: Defines the schema of dataSource. If the `columns` declaration is empty or undefined then the `columns` are automatically generated from data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.ContextMenuItems
member.summary:
`contextMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom context menu items.
The available built-in items are, `AutoFitAll` - Auto fit the size of all columns. `AutoFit` - Auto fit the current column. `Group` - Group by current column. `Ungroup` - Ungroup by current column. `Edit` - Edit the current record. `Delete` - Delete the current record. `Save` - Save the edited record. `Cancel` - Cancel the edited state. `Copy` - Copy the selected records. `PdfExport` - Export the grid as Pdf format. `ExcelExport` - Export the grid as Excel format. `CsvExport` - Export the grid as CSV format. `SortAscending` - Sort the current column in ascending order. `SortDescending` - Sort the current column in descending order. `FirstPage` - Go to the first page. `PrevPage` - Go to the previous page. `LastPage` - Go to the last page. `NextPage` - Go to the next page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.CurrencyCode
member.summary: Defines the currencyCode format of the Grid columns

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.DataSource
member.summary: It is used to render grid table rows. If the `dataSource` is an array of JavaScript objects, then Grid will create instance of [`DataManager`](../data/api-dataManager.html) from this `dataSource`. If the `dataSource` is an existing [`DataManager`](../data/api-dataManager.html), the Grid will not initialize a new one.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.DetailTemplate
member.summary: The detail template allows you to show or hide additional information about a particular row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.EditSettings
member.summary: Configures the edit settings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.EnableAltRow
member.summary: If `enableAltRow` is set to true, the grid will render with `e-altrow` CSS class to the alternative tr elements. > Check the [`AltRow`](./row.html#styling-alternate-rows) to customize the styles of alternative rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.EnableColumnVirtualization
member.summary: If `enableColumnVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the columns visible within the view-port and load subsequent columns on horizontal scrolling. This helps to load large dataset of columns in Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.EnableHover
member.summary: If `enableHover` is set to true, the row hover is enabled in the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.EnableVirtualization
member.summary: If `enableVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the rows visible within the view-port and load subsequent rows on vertical scrolling. This helps to load large dataset in Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.FilterSettings
member.summary: Configures the filter settings of the Grid.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of frozen columns.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of frozen rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.GridLines
member.summary: Defines the mode of grid lines. The available modes are, `Both`: Displays both horizontal and vertical grid lines. `None`: No grid lines are displayed. `Horizontal`: Displays the horizontal grid lines only. `Vertical`: Displays the vertical grid lines only. `Default`: Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.Grid.Toolbar
member.summary:
`toolbar` defines the ToolBar items of the Grid. It contains built-in and custom toolbar items. If a string value is assigned to the `toolbar` option, it is considered as the template for the whole Grid ToolBar. If an array value is assigned, it is considered as the list of built-in and custom toolbar items in the Grid's Toolbar.
The following code example implements the custom toolbar items.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.ColumnName(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the column name to display the aggregate value. If `columnName` is not defined, then `field` name value will be assigned to the `columnName` property.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.CustomAggregate(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines a function to calculate custom aggregate value. The `type` value should be set to `custom`. To use custom aggregate value in the template, use the key as `${custom}`. Total aggregation: The custom function will be called with the whole data and the current `AggregateColumn` object. Group aggregation: This will be called with the current group details and the `AggregateColumn` object.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.CustomAggregate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines a function to calculate custom aggregate value. The `type` value should be set to `custom`. To use custom aggregate value in the template, use the key as `${custom}`. Total aggregation: The custom function will be called with the whole data and the current `AggregateColumn` object. Group aggregation: This will be called with the current group details and the `AggregateColumn` object.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.Field(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the column name to perform aggregation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.FooterTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Format is applied to a calculated value before it is displayed. Gets the format from the user, which can be standard or custom [`number`](../base/intl.html#number-formatter-and-parser) and [`date`](../base/intl.html#date-formatter-and-parser) formats.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.GroupCaptionTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the group caption cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field name. key: The current grouped field value.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.GroupFooterTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the group footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field. key: The current grouped value.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.Type(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the aggregate type of a particular column. To use multiple aggregates for single column, specify the `type` as array. Types of aggregate are, sum average max min count truecount falsecount custom > Specify the `type` value as `custom` to use custom aggregation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder.EnableColumnVirtualization(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableColumnVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the columns visible within the view-port and load subsequent columns on horizontal scrolling. This helps to load large dataset of columns in Grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder.EnableVirtualization(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the rows visible within the view-port and load subsequent rows on vertical scrolling. This helps to load large dataset in Grid.

member.summary: Defines the mode of grid lines. The available modes are, `Both`: Displays both horizontal and vertical grid lines. `None`: No grid lines are displayed. `Horizontal`: Displays the horizontal grid lines only. `Vertical`: Displays the vertical grid lines only. `Default`: Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder.Toolbar(System.Object)
member.summary:
`toolbar` defines the ToolBar items of the Grid. It contains built-in and custom toolbar items. If a string value is assigned to the `toolbar` option, it is considered as the template for the whole Grid ToolBar. If an array value is assigned, it is considered as the list of built-in and custom toolbar items in the Grid's Toolbar.
The following code example implements the custom toolbar items.

member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumnBuilder.Field(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource. The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc., If the `field` name contains “dot”, then it is considered as complex binding. The `field` name must be a valid JavaScript identifier, the first character must be an alphabet and should not contain spaces and special characters.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumnBuilder.Filter(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the filter options to customize filtering for the particular column. @default null

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumnBuilder.FilterBarTemplate(System.Object)
member.summary: The `filterBarTemplate` is used to add a custom component instead of default input component for filter bar. It have create and read functions. create: It is used for creating custom components. read: It is used to perform custom filter action.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.ShowConfirmDialog(System.Boolean)
member.summary: if `showConfirmDialog` is set to false, confirm dialog does not show when batch changes are saved or discarded.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.ShowDeleteConfirmDialog(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showDeleteConfirmDialog` is set to true, confirm dialog will show delete action. You can also cancel delete command.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies the columns to be filtered at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the columns that were currently filtered.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.IgnoreAccent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.ImmediateModeDelay(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the time delay (in milliseconds) in filtering records when the `Immediate` mode of filter bar is set.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.FilterBarMode)
member.summary: Defines the filter bar modes. The available options are, `OnEnter`: Initiates filter operation after Enter key is pressed. `Immediate`: Initiates filter operation after a certain time interval. By default, time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Operators(System.Object)
member.summary: The `operators` is used to override the default operators in filter menu. This should be defined by type wise (string, number, date and boolean). Based on the column type, this customize operator list will render in filter menu.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.ShowFilterBarStatus(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Shows or hides the filtered status message on the pager.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.FilterType)
member.summary: Defines options for filtering type. The available options are `Menu` - Specifies the filter type as menu. `CheckBox` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox. `FilterBar` - Specifies the filter type as filterbar. `Excel` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.CaptionTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: The Caption Template allows user to display the string or HTML element in group caption. > It accepts either the [template string](http://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/base/template-engine.html) or the HTML element ID.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.String[])
member.summary: Specifies the column names to group at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the currently grouped columns.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.DisablePageWiseAggregates(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `disablePageWiseAggregates` set to true, then the group aggregate value will be calculated from the whole data instead of paged data and two requests will be made for each page when Grid bound with remote service.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowDropArea(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showDropArea` is set to true, the group drop area element will be visible at the top of the Grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowGroupedColumn(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showGroupedColumn` is set to false, it hides the grouped column after grouping.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowToggleButton(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showToggleButton` set to true, then the toggle button will be showed in the column headers which can be used to group or ungroup columns by clicking them.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowUngroupButton(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showUngroupButton` set to false, then ungroup button is hidden in dropped element. It can be used to ungroup the grouped column when click on ungroup button.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.CurrentPage(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the current page number of the pager.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.EnableQueryString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableQueryString` set to true, then it pass current page information as a query string along with the URL while navigating to other page.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageCount(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the number of pages to be displayed in the pager container.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSize(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the number of records to be displayed per page.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSizes(System.Object)
member.summary: If `pageSizes` set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSizes(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `pageSizes` set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.Template(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the template which renders customized elements in pager instead of default elements. It accepts either [template string](../base/template-engine.html) or HTML element ID.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridRowDropSettingsBuilder.TargetID(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the ID of droppable component on which row drop should occur.

member.summary: Specifies the collection of fields included in search operation. By default, bounded columns of the Grid are included.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSearchSettingsBuilder.IgnoreAccent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSearchSettingsBuilder.IgnoreCase(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `ignoreCase` is set to false, searches records that match exactly, else searches records that are case insensitive(uppercase and lowercase letters treated the same).

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSearchSettingsBuilder.Key(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the key value to search Grid records at initial rendering. You can also get the current search key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSearchSettingsBuilder.Operator(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the operator to search records. The available operators are:

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CellSelectionMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.CellSelectionMode)
member.summary: The cell selection modes are flow and box. It requires the selection [`mode`](./api-selectionSettings.html#mode-selectionmode) to be either cell or both. `Flow`: Selects the range of cells between start index and end index that also includes the other cells of the selected rows. `Box`: Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CheckboxOnly(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'checkboxOnly' set to true, then the Grid selection is allowed only through checkbox.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionMode)
member.summary: Grid supports row, cell, and both (row and cell) selection mode.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.PersistSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'persistSelection' set to true, then the Grid selection is persisted on all operations. For persisting selection in the Grid, any one of the column should be enabled as a primary key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionType)
member.summary: Defines options for selection type. They are `Single`: Allows selection of only a row or a cell. `Multiple`: Allows selection of multiple rows or cells.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSortSettingsBuilder.AllowUnsort(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowUnsort` set to false the user can not get the grid in unsorted state by clicking the sorted column header.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSortSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies the columns to sort at initial rendering of Grid. Also user can get current sorted columns.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridTextWrapSettingsBuilder.WrapMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.WrapMode)
member.summary: Defines the `wrapMode` of the Grid. The available modes are: `Both`: Wraps both the header and content. `Content`: Wraps the header alone. `Header`: Wraps the content alone.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.IntervalType
member.summary: Defines the interval type of datetime axis. They are years - Define the interval of the axis in years. months - Define the interval of the axis in months. days - Define the interval of the axis in days. hours - Define the interval of the axis in hours. minutes - Define the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.ValueType
member.summary: Defines the type of axis. They are double - Renders a numeric axis. dateTime - Renders a dateTime axis. category - Renders a category axis.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.PaletteType
member.summary: Defines Color for cell.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.Alignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.LegendPosition
member.summary: Defines the Legend position Left - Legend in the left position Right - Legend in the left right position Up - Legend in the left up position Down -Legend in the left down position

member.summary: Specifies the interval for an axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.HeatMapAxis.IntervalType
member.summary: Specifies the types like `Years`, `Months`, `Days`, `Hours`, `Minutes` in date time axis.They are, Years: Defines the interval of the axis in years. Months: Defines the interval of the axis in months. Days: Defines the interval of the axis in days. Hours: Defines the interval of the axis in hours. Minutes: Defines the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.HeatMapAxis.IsInversed
member.summary: It specifies whether the axis to be rendered in inversed manner or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.HeatMapAxis.LabelFormat
member.summary: Used to format the axis label that accepts any global string format like 'C', 'n1', 'P' etc. It also accepts placeholder like '{value}°C' in which value represent the axis label, e.g, 20°C.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.HeatMapAxis.LabelIntersectAction
member.summary: Specifies the actions like `Rotate45`, `None` and `Trim` when the axis labels intersect with each other.They are, None: Shows all the labels. Rotate45: Rotates the label to 45 degree when it intersects. Trim : Trim the label when label text width exceed the label width

Months: Defines the interval of the axis in months. Days: Defines the interval of the axis in days. Hours: Defines the interval of the axis in hours. Minutes: Defines the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.HeatMapAxisBuilder.LabelIntersectAction(Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.LabelIntersectAction)
member.summary: Specifies the actions like `Rotate45`, `None` and `Trim` when the axis labels intersect with each other.They are, None: Shows all the labels. Rotate45: Rotates the label to 45 degree when it intersects. Trim : Trim the label when label text width exceed the label width

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.BingMapType
member.summary: Defines bing map types Aerial - specifies the Aerial type AerialWithLabels - specifies the AerialWithLabels type Road - specifies the Road type

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.GeometryType
member.summary: Defines the geometry type. They are Geographic - Default value of geometry layer. Normal - Normal rendering of geometry layer.

member.summary: Defines the Layer types. Geometry - Specifies the geometry type. Bing - Specifies the Bing type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.Type
member.summary: Defines the map layer types. Layer - Specifies the layer type. SubLayer - Specifies the sublayer type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.MarkerType
member.summary: Defines the marker types. Circle - Specifies the Circle type. Rectangle - Specifies the Rectangle type. Cross - Specifies the Cross type. Diamond - Specifies the Diamond type. Star - Specifies the Star type. Balloon - Specifies the Balloon type. Triangle - Specifies the Triangle type. HorizontalLine - Specifies the HorizontalLine type. VerticalLine - Specifies the VerticalLine type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.BubbleType
member.summary: Defines the bubble type

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.IntersectAction
member.summary: Defines the label intersect action. They are Trim - Trims the intersected datalabel None - Intersection action is not applied Hide - Hides the intersected datalabel

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.SmartLabelMode
member.summary: Defines the smart label mode. They are Trim - Trims the datalabel which exceed the region None - Smart label mode is not applied hide - Hide the datalabel which exceeds the region

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.AnnotationAlignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are none - Default alignment as none near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.Alignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.summary: Defines the tool bar orientation

member.summary: Defines the label placement type

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendMode

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendArrangement
member.summary: Defines the legend arrangement

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendPosition
member.summary: Defines the position of the legend. They are top - Displays the legend on the top of maps. left - Displays the legend on the left of maps. bottom - Displays the legend on the bottom of maps. right - Displays the legend on the right of maps. float - Displays the legend based on given x and y value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendShape
member.summary: Defines the shape of legend. They are circle - Renders a circle. rectangle - Renders a rectangle. triangle - Renders a triangle. diamond - Renders a diamond. cross - Renders a cross. Star - Renders a star. horizontalLine - Renders a horizontalLine. verticalLine - Renders a verticalLine. pentagon - Renders a pentagon. invertedTriangle - Renders a invertedTriangle.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendType
member.summary: Defines the Legend types. They are Layers - Legend applicable to Layers. Bubbles - Legend applicable to Bubbles. Markers - Legend applicable to Markers.

member.summary: Specifies the Button component model properties to render the Toast action buttons.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Animation
member.summary: Specifies the animation configuration settings for showing and hiding the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Buttons
member.summary: Specifies the collection of Toast action `buttons` to be rendered with the given Button model properties and its click action handler.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Content
member.summary: Specifies the content to be displayed on the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.CssClass
member.summary: Defines single/multiple classes (separated by space) to be used for customization of Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.ExtendedTimeout
member.summary: Specifies the Toast display time duration after interacting with the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the Toast in pixels/number/percentage. Number value is considered as pixels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Icon
member.summary: Defines CSS classes to specify an icon for the Toast which is to be displayed at top left corner of the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.NewestOnTop
member.summary: Specifies the newly created Toast message display order while multiple toast's are added to page one after another. By default, newly added Toast will be added after old Toast's.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Position
member.summary: Specifies the position of the Toast message to be displayed within target container. In the case of multiple Toast display, new Toast position will not update on dynamic change of property values until the old Toast messages removed. X values are: Left , Right ,Center Y values are: Top , Bottom

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.ShowCloseButton
member.summary: Specifies whether to show the close button in Toast message to close the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.ShowProgressBar
member.summary: Specifies whether to show the progress bar to denote the Toast message display timeout.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Target
member.summary: Specifies the target container where the Toast to be displayed. Based on the target, the positions such as `Left`, `Top` will be applied to the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Template
member.summary: Specifies the HTML element/element ID as a string that can be displayed as a Toast. The given template is taken as preference to render the Toast, even if the built-in properties such as title and content are defined.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.TimeOut

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.AllowReordering
member.summary: If `allowReordering` is set to true, Grid columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index. > If Grid is rendered with stacked headers, reordering is allowed only at the same level as the column headers.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.AllowResizing
member.summary: If `allowResizing` is set to true, Grid columns can be resized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.AllowSelection
member.summary: If `allowSelection` is set to true, it allows selection of (highlight row) Grid records by clicking it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.AllowTextWrap
member.summary: If `allowTextWrap` set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.ColumnWidth
member.summary: Defines the height of Grid rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.ContextMenuItems
member.summary: `contextMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom context menu items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.GridLines
member.summary: Defines the mode of grid lines. The available modes are, `Both`: Displays both horizontal and vertical grid lines. `None`: No grid lines are displayed. `Horizontal`: Displays the horizontal grid lines only. `Vertical`: Displays the vertical grid lines only. `Default`: Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.PrintMode
member.summary: Defines the print modes. The available print modes are `AllPages`: Prints all pages of the Grid. `CurrentPage`: Prints the current page of the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.RowHeight
member.summary: Defines the height of Grid rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.SelectedRowIndex

member.summary: If `allowReordering` is set to true, Grid columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index. > If Grid is rendered with stacked headers, reordering is allowed only at the same level as the column headers.

member.summary: If `allowTextWrap` set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettingsBuilder.ClipMode(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettingsBuilder.ColumnWidth(System.Double)

member.summary: `contextMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom context menu items.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettingsBuilder.GridLines(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the mode of grid lines. The available modes are, `Both`: Displays both horizontal and vertical grid lines. `None`: No grid lines are displayed. `Horizontal`: Displays the horizontal grid lines only. `Vertical`: Displays the vertical grid lines only. `Default`: Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettingsBuilder.PrintMode(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the print modes. The available print modes are `AllPages`: Prints all pages of the Grid. `CurrentPage`: Prints the current page of the Grid.

member.summary: Allows additional HTML attributes such as title, name, etc., and It will be accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.IframeSettings
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in an iframe mode, and it has the following properties. enable - Set Boolean value to enable, the editors content is placed in an iframe and isolated from the rest of the page. attributes - Custom style to be used inside the iframe to display content. This style is added to the iframe body. resources - we can add both styles and scripts to the iframe. 1. styles[] - An array of CSS style files to inject inside the iframe to display content 2. scripts[] - An array of JS script files to inject inside the iframe

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.InlineMode
member.summary: Enable or disable the inline edit mode. enable - set boolean value to enable or disable the inline edit mode. onSelection - If its set to true, upon selecting the text, the toolbar is opened in inline. If its set to false, upon clicking to the target element, the toolbar is opened.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.InsertImageSettings
member.summary: Specifies the image insert options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. allowedTypes - Specifies the extensions of the image types allowed to insert on bowering and passing the extensions with comma separators. For example, pass allowedTypes as .jpg and .png. display - Sets the default display for an image when it is inserted in to the RichTextEditor. Possible options are: 'inline' and 'block'. width - Sets the default width of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. height - Sets the default height of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. saveUrl - Provides URL to map the action result method to save the image. path - Specifies the location to store the image.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.KeyConfig
member.summary: Customizes the key actions in RichTextEditor. For example, when using German keyboard, the key actions can be customized using these shortcuts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.MaxLength
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the RichTextEditor component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Placeholder
member.summary: Specifies the placeholder for the RichTextEditor’s content used when the RichTextEditor body is empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.QuickToolbarSettings
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on the target element. It has following fields: enable - set boolean value to show or hide the quick toolbar actionOnScroll - it has two possible options 1. hide: The quickToolbar is closed when the parent element is scrolled. 2. none: The quickToolbar cannot be closed even the parent element is scrolled. link - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on link element such as `Open`, `Edit`, and `UnLink`. image - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on image element such as 'Replace', 'Align', 'Caption', 'Remove', 'InsertLink', 'Display', 'AltText', 'Dimension'. text - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on text element such as 'Cut', 'Copy', 'Paste'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Readonly
member.summary: The user interactions on the component are disabled, when set to true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.ShowCharCount
member.summary: Sets Boolean value to enable or disable the display of the character counter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.ToolbarSettings
member.summary: Specifies the group of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar as well as defined the toolbar rendering type. By default, toolbar is float at the top of the RichTextEditor. When you scroll down, the toolbar will scroll along with the page on RichTextEditor with the specified offset value. enable: set boolean value to show or hide the toolbar. enableFloating: Set Boolean value to enable or disable the floating toolbar. Preserves the toolbar at top of the RichTextEditor on scrolling. type: it has two possible options 1. Expand: Hide the overflowing toolbar items in the next row. Click the expand arrow to view overflowing toolbar items 2. MultiRow: The toolbar overflowing items wrapped in the next row. items: Specifies the array of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar. > | and - can insert a vertical and horizontal separator lines in the toolbar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.UndoRedoSteps
member.summary: Specifies the count of undo history which is stored in undoRedoManager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.UndoRedoTimer
member.summary: Specifies the interval value in milliseconds that store actions in undoRedoManager. The minimum value is 300 milliseconds.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Value
member.summary: Specifies the value displayed in the RichTextEditor's content area and it should be string. The content of RichTextEditor can be loaded with dynamic data such as database, AJAX content, and more.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.ValueTemplate
member.summary: Accepts the template design and assigns it as RichTextEditor’s content. For more details about the available template options refer to [`Template`](./templates.html) documentation. The built-in template engine which provides options to compile template string into a executable function. For EX: We have expression evolution as like ES6 expression string literals

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.IframeSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorIFrameSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in an iframe mode, and it has the following properties. enable - Set Boolean value to enable, the editors content is placed in an iframe and isolated from the rest of the page. attributes - Custom style to be used inside the iframe to display content. This style is added to the iframe body. resources - we can add both styles and scripts to the iframe. 1. styles[] - An array of CSS style files to inject inside the iframe to display content 2. scripts[] - An array of JS script files to inject inside the iframe

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.InlineMode(System.Object)
member.summary: Enable or disable the inline edit mode. enable - set boolean value to enable or disable the inline edit mode. onSelection - If its set to true, upon selecting the text, the toolbar is opened in inline. If its set to false, upon clicking to the target element, the toolbar is opened.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.InsertImageSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorImageSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the image insert options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. allowedTypes - Specifies the extensions of the image types allowed to insert on bowering and passing the extensions with comma separators. For example, pass allowedTypes as .jpg and .png. display - Sets the default display for an image when it is inserted in to the RichTextEditor. Possible options are: 'inline' and 'block'. width - Sets the default width of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. height - Sets the default height of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. saveUrl - Provides URL to map the action result method to save the image. path - Specifies the location to store the image.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.KeyConfig(System.Object)
member.summary: Customizes the key actions in RichTextEditor. For example, when using German keyboard, the key actions can be customized using these shortcuts.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.Locale(System.String)
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.MaxLength(System.Double)
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the RichTextEditor component.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.Placeholder(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the placeholder for the RichTextEditor’s content used when the RichTextEditor body is empty.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.QuickToolbarSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorQuickToolbarSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on the target element. It has following fields: enable - set boolean value to show or hide the quick toolbar actionOnScroll - it has two possible options 1. hide: The quickToolbar is closed when the parent element is scrolled. 2. none: The quickToolbar cannot be closed even the parent element is scrolled. link - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on link element such as `Open`, `Edit`, and `UnLink`. image - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on image element such as 'Replace', 'Align', 'Caption', 'Remove', 'InsertLink', 'Display', 'AltText', 'Dimension'. text - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on text element such as 'Cut', 'Copy', 'Paste'.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.ShowCharCount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets Boolean value to enable or disable the display of the character counter.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.ToolbarSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorToolbarSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the group of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar as well as defined the toolbar rendering type. By default, toolbar is float at the top of the RichTextEditor. When you scroll down, the toolbar will scroll along with the page on RichTextEditor with the specified offset value. enable: set boolean value to show or hide the toolbar. enableFloating: Set Boolean value to enable or disable the floating toolbar. Preserves the toolbar at top of the RichTextEditor on scrolling. type: it has two possible options 1. Expand: Hide the overflowing toolbar items in the next row. Click the expand arrow to view overflowing toolbar items 2. MultiRow: The toolbar overflowing items wrapped in the next row. items: Specifies the array of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar. > | and - can insert a vertical and horizontal separator lines in the toolbar.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.UndoRedoSteps(System.Double)
member.summary: Specifies the count of undo history which is stored in undoRedoManager.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.UndoRedoTimer(System.Double)
member.summary: Specifies the interval value in milliseconds that store actions in undoRedoManager. The minimum value is 300 milliseconds.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.Value(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the value displayed in the RichTextEditor's content area and it should be string. The content of RichTextEditor can be loaded with dynamic data such as database, AJAX content, and more.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.ValueTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts the template design and assigns it as RichTextEditor’s content. For more details about the available template options refer to [`Template`](./templates.html) documentation. The built-in template engine which provides options to compile template string into a executable function. For EX: We have expression evolution as like ES6 expression string literals
